pci_databases_namespaces_add_type_popove: There can only be one non-aggregated namespace
pci_databases_namespaces_add_retention_p: The data retention duration for the namespace in short time format. Examples: 20s, 10m, 24h, 1d
pci_databases_namespaces_add_resolution_: The resolution for an aggregated namespace.
pci_databases_namespaces_add_writes_comm: Defines whether M3DB should include writes to this namespace in the commitlog.
pci_databases_namespaces_add_snaphot_ena: Defines whether M3DB should create snapshot files for this namespace.
pci_databases_namespaces_add_blocksize_d: The amount of time a block is held in memory before it is written to disk, in short time format. Examples: 20s, 10m, 24h, 1d
pci_databases_namespaces_add_buffer_past: A past duration for which writes are still accepted on the name space, in short time format. Examples: 20s, 10m, 24h, 1d
pci_databases_namespaces_add_buffer_futu: A future duration for which writes on the namespace are already accepted, in short time format. Examples: 20s, 10m, 24h, 1d
pci_databases_namespaces_add_error_messa: An error has occurred creating the {{name}} namespace. Please try again later.
